ex-brief.brief: Associate Web Developer Virtusa Corporation (05/2019 to Current)
description: Took concepts and produced design mockups and prototypes to strengthen designs, enhance user experiences and improve site interactions. And to develope the frontend in the way that was presented in design phase (Angular, React js : 12-2019 to Current)
I am also trained and deployed as a java web developer (Spring : 5-2019 to 11-2019)
Developed initial A&E dashbroad poc project (internal production projects analysis application) and carried out for production. Also got client love your work badge.
Part of UI developement and test run in armada production project (internal AWS service management application).
And also resolved UI related issues apart from my project and also got client appreciation badges from their side.
Developed a ui reusable components for drag and drop nodes with their relationship from entry node to exit node poc project (similar to amazon connect).
And also done some personal anime stream poc on react.
Key player on Developing internal organization Q&A forum trainee poc project using Spring MVC and mysql.
Key features are post ranking, automation deletion, re-post, search post and pagination.
And also done some poc's on hibernate ORM and spring boot on that time.
